content:
pasted image
Should have done this years ago.... anyone else struggling?
Yes. I sent out a company-wide suggestion to do this, as well

LOL. It's even easier to add EHR to the MS-Word dictionary.
https://support.office.com/en-us/article/add-or-edit-words-in-a-spell-check-dictionary-56e5c373-29f8-4d11-baf6-87151725c0dc
Maybe the easier path would be to start calling them "Health Electronic Records".

Maybe the easier path would be to start calling them "Health Electronic Records".

You REALIZE you just proposed that society should cave in to the bad behavior of annoying technology, right? :-)

And you know this is HL7, right? That seems like much more of a HIMSS proposal. :slight_smile:

society should cave in to bad behavior

hmmm.... that seems to be how it goes these days

Well, this is why we soldier on INSTEAD of caving. (This prompted me to discover the QuoteInvestigator page on "all that's necessary for evil to triumph" which is surprisingly long and time-wasting unless you're really into such things.)

Though I'm not Jewish, I've long subscribed (without thinking about it) to Hillel's "If I am not for others, who am I? If not now, when?"

Which is why we soldier on INSTEAD of caving. (Oo, I absent-mindedly looped back to the top. At least I'm consistent.)
(Have we drifted away from MSWord enough yet? MS did host DevDays this year, y'know.)
